roles.name: .NET Developer
roles.message_body:
Hello,

I noticed your post for a .NET Developer position. I specialize in building scalable full-stack solutions using C#, ASP.NET Core 8, and Azure Cloud. Please find my resume attached.

Thank you,
Rithwik Raj Mallam

roles.name: SDET / QA Engineer
roles.message_body:
Hello,

I came across your post for an SDET / QA Engineer role. I specialize in Selenium, Pytest, and data validation across AWS Glue and Snowflake pipelines. Please find my resume attached.

Thank you,
Rithwik Raj Mallam
